Other Information.Test Conditions: Basic solution, battery operating conditions (1.8-2.8 V)
Other Information.Additional Info: Negatively charged polysulfides are repelled by the negatively charged ZBCP layer.

Sieving Mechanism: Electrostatic repulsion of negatively charged species

Experimental Validation.Method: Battery performance tests, zeta potential measurements, FTIR spectroscopy
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Initial capacity: 1272 mAh g-1, Capacity after 200 cycles: 738 mAh g-1, Polysulfide permeation significantly reduced

Other Information.Additional Info: The material was synthesized at air/water interfaces and is amorphous with a thickness of approximately 3.2 nm.
